meta.description: Optimize the production of hardwood and vinyl planks to maximize profit while meeting demand and production constraints.

params.name: demand
params.description: Minimum demand for each product in square feet

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum production capacity for each product in square feet

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per square foot for each product

vars.name: production
vars.description: Production amount in square feet for each product

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from hardwood and vinyl production

constraints.name: capacity_hardwood
constraints.description: Do not exceed production capacity for hardwood

constraints.name: capacity_vinyl
constraints.description: Do not exceed production capacity for vinyl
